page.title: 12SUPERNATURAL
page.content: No well established{ghost}is known, though in very recent times a walker on the moors came in great haste and fear into the village, saying he had seen a ghost on the moors. {Supernatural Beliefs. A Mountain Ash tree was often planted directly outside the door of a farmhouse to ward off witches. Cattle grazing towards the top of a hill means fine weather. If a garment is accidentally put on back to front or inside out _ don't change it or you will change your luck. Throw spilt salt over your shoulder.
